structure.unit: B ADMISSION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WITH AN INTELLECTUAL DISABILITY

law.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Kentucky Admission Act for Individuals with an Intellectual Disability".
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 45, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 33, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 328, sec. 1.
